mapper.select: SELECT u.userId,u.userName,u.mobile,u.senior,u.workyear,u.createTime,u.type,u.otherBundId ,CASE WHEN ABS(DATEDIFF(recentUseTime,NOW())) <= #{diffValue} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS userState ,j.name AS jobTypeName ,city.name AS cityName FROM user u LEFT JOIN jobtype j ON u.jobTypeId = j.id LEFT JOIN system_acer_code city ON u.areaId = city.id WHERE u.type = 0 AND CASE WHEN ABS(DATEDIFF(recentUseTime,NOW())) <= #{diffValue} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END = #{userState} ORDER BY u.recentUseTime DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
